properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 4:43AM EST until February 11 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers
in Virginia...

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and
Halifax Counties
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia..
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

The Dan River at Paces and the Roanoke River at Randolph have dropped
below flood stage. There was Minor flooding on the Dan River at South Boston
and the river continued to recede.

the Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* until Tuesday morning.
* at 04AM Monday the stage was 28.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by tonight.
* Impact...at 29.0 feet...A number of businesses in the Riverdale
area are affected.
* Flood history...the crest compares to a previous crest of 30.3
feet on April 26 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.

The next scheduled statement will be issued around noon.
